name: agent-training-factory
title: Agent Training Data Factory - AI Agent Memory & RAG Dataset Generator
description: Generate high-quality training datasets for AI agents including conversations, Q&A pairs, tool calls, reasoning chains, memory patterns, and embeddings. Perfect for RAG systems, LLM fine-tuning, and agent development. Ground synthetic data in real scraped patterns from Apify actors.

dataset.title: Training Data Output
dataset.description: Generated training dataset in selected format (JSONL, Parquet, or HuggingFace)

seoTitle: AI Agent Training Data Generator - RAG Datasets & Conversation Synthesis
seoDescription: Generate training datasets for AI agents: conversations, Q&A pairs, tool calls, reasoning chains, memory patterns & embeddings. Ground synthetic data in real patterns. Perfect for RAG, fine-tuning & agent development.
